New Records: Freddie Freeman hit a World Series record 12 RBIs and four home runs
Key Match Events: The Dodgers fell behind by five runs after the third inning but came back to win the game
Aaron Judge dropped a routine fly ball that bounced off his glove
Chisholm Jr. couldn't handle a bouncing throw from Anthony Volpe for the force out at third base
Gerrit Cole didn't cover the bag on a routine grounder to first
The Yankees fought back and took a 6-5 lead on a sacrifice fly in the bottom of the 6th
The Dodgers moved ahead of the Yankees with timely sacrifice flies in the top of the eighth
Blake Treinen got Giancarlo Stanton to pop out to end the threat in the bottom of the 8th
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers were knocked down, beaten, and left for dead several times throughout the regular season, but each and every time they got back up and persevered
The team had already been through hardships and setbacks, and were battle-tested and brave
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers finally triumphed by winning their first World Series title in 32 years, but they weren’t able to celebrate it
The team was finally able to celebrate their title with a parade down Vin Scully Avenue
The Dodgers have won the World Series, can you believe it? They really, finally, did it
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers' journey to the 2024 World Series title was filled with triumphs and tribulations, and it completely encapsulated their season, and the last twelve years overall
The team's World Series victory carries the weight of over a decade of pent-up hopes, dreams, and high expectations
The Dodgers are finally kings of baseball once again
This golden era, long promised by president Andrew Friedman, has finally taken its place in the annals of Dodgers lore
Others: The Dodgers' World Series MVP Freddie Freeman looked back on the team’s long road to get here with pride
The team's manager Dave Roberts managed each bullpen decision and lineup change with precision, guiding his squad through injuries and adversity to pull off the perfect postseason strategy
